RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT SCHEME_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM TXTMS_SCHEME WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A'
SELECT TAX_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION FROM TXTMS_TAX_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_TYPE='T' AND RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'

SELECT DISTINCT AMOUNT_TAG, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT_TAG_TYPE FROM OLTBS_AMOUNT_TAG WHERE (TAX_ALLOWED = 'Y' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = GLOBAL.LANG AND MODULE = ?) MINUS SELECT DISTINCT AMOUNT_TAG, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT_TAG_TYPE FROM OLTBS_AMOUNT_TAG WHERE AMOUNT_TAG = 'PRINCIPAL' AND ? = 'LIQD'
SELECT EVENT_CODE, EVENT_DESCR FROM OLTBS_EVENT WHERE TAX_ALLOWED = 'Y' AND MODULE = ?
